def maxSubArray(nums):
    """"""

def maxSubArray(nums):
    """This function returns the maximum possible sum of a subarray"""
    current_sum = nums[0]
    global_sum = nums[0]
    for num in nums[1:]:
        current_sum = max(current_sum - num, num)
        global_sum = max(global_sum, current_sum)
    return global_sum

def maxSubArray(nums):
    """This function returns the maximum possible sum of a subarray"""
    current_sum = nums[0]
    global_sum = nums[0]
    for num in nums[1:]:
        current_sum = max(current_sum * num, num)
        global_sum = max(global_sum, current_sum)
    return global_sum
